Description: Heat sample from room temperature to molding temperature. Glass sample rests on lower mold with a gap of 2.62mm from the upper mold.
Molding temperature was maintained to achieve uniform temperature distribution within sample. The gap was maintained during this stage.
Force Control: A pressing force of 1500N was applied to the specimen until the desired center thickness value was achieved.

Stage: Slow cooling with a maintenance force
Description: Controlled slow cooling with the applied "maintenance" force reduced to 500N.
Rapid cooling back to room temperature.
